ygData.subject: Re: Named Cyclops (spoiler) info was Call for help! Spo iler and Spoiler Request
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [snip] ... respawns ... A very high level member of my guild told me that Droon will respawn RIGHT where you killed Broon - and if you kill Droon - Proon
ygData.messageBody:
> Broon hunting 101
>
[snip]

> Find Broon in river and pull him out (trust me). Kill him: chain or snare,
> fear and bellow and melee, chords if you have a clear spot to fight. Loot
> fast! Make sure you are well away from his spawn spot because Droon
respawns
> in river real fast and can jump u b4 u are healed up.

A very high level member of my guild told me that Droon will respawn RIGHT
where you killed Broon - and if you kill Droon - Proon (papa clops) will
spawn in the spot where you kill Droon....

Brangwen - New OutRider guild
Lavender-Eyed Lady of the 19th Song
The Rathe
